tool_description: Optimizes fixture selections to maximize value within budget constraints while meeting priority requirements.

product_ids.description: List of all candidate product IDs for optimization

required_fixtures.description: Required fixture types that must be included

priority_weights.description: Priority weights for quality, style, features (must sum to 10)

include_installation.description: Include installation costs in budget calculation

contingency_percent.description: Percentage of budget to reserve for contingency (0-20)

error_messages: Insufficient budget: Total budget is too low to meet minimum fixture requirements
Invalid priority weights: Weights must be positive integers that sum to 10
Invalid contingency percentage: Must be between 0 and 20
Required fixtures not available: Some required fixture types not found in candidate products
Budget constraint violation: Cannot find viable combination within specified budget
usage: Provide product_ids, total_budget, and required_fixtures. Adjust priority_weights to emphasize quality, style, or features. Enable include_installation for realistic budgeting.

optimal_selection.description: Array of product IDs in the optimal selection

total_cost.description: Total cost of optimal selection including all specified factors

value_score.description: Overall value score of the optimal selection from 1-100

alternative_options.description: Array of alternative product combinations if optimal selection is not suitable
